oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Education and Women's Resiliency: Exploring the Experiences of Successful Women from Disadvantaged Backgrounds
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lepage-Lees, Pamela
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: While some research has explored the needs of minority women, very little research has focused onwomen who have faced other disadvantages beyond those associated with minority status.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Education Leadership Research Center, Texas A&M University
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Advancing Women in Leadership Journal; Vol. 3 (1998)
